family: Search wildlife data by taxonomic family. Note that, depending on the family, it may take a while to retrieve all data.
order: Search wildlife data by taxonomic order. Note that, depending on the order, it may take a while to retrieve all data.
class: Search wildlife data by taxonomic class. Note that, depending on the class, it may take a while to retrieve all data.
phylum: Search wildlife data by phylum. Note that, depending on the phylum, it may take a while to retrieve all data.
stateSelect: Select states for which to return wildlife data. If you have selected individual sampling locations that are not in the specified states, those results will still be included.
countySelect: Select counties for which to return wildlife data. If you have selected individual sampling locations that are not in the specified counties, those results will still be included.
siteSelect: Select sampling locations for which to return wildlife data. If you have also selected states, the search will also return data for all locations in those states.
timeRange: Time range for which to return wildlife data.
coordRange: Look for wildlife data within a specified coordinate range.
